projects.title: Flash Cards
projects.description: An interactive flash card tool to help students memorize concepts efficiently with spaced repetition.

projects.title: Duck Race
projects.description: A duck racing stats tracker and simulator built with React and a PostgreSQL backend.

projects.title: Duck Race
projects.description: A duck racing stats tracker and simulator built with React and a PostgreSQL backend.

cards.question: What is JSX?
cards.answer: JSX is a syntax extension for JavaScript that allows you to write HTML inside React.

cards.question: What is useState?
cards.answer: A React hook that lets you add state to function components.

cards.question: What is a closure?
cards.answer: A closure is a function that has access to its outer function scope even after the outer function has returned.

cards.question: What is hoisting?
cards.answer: Hoisting is JavaScript's behavior of moving declarations to the top of a scope before code execution.
